title: Martin Solomon
content:
I was very depressed today to get an email from the Type Directors Club informing me that Martin Solomon had passed away:

[Martin Solomon](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829234942/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2006solomon.html)

We are very sorry to inform you that Martin Solomon passed away Wednesday, March 7th. He was at home when he suffered a heart attack. Martin was a very dear friend, member of the Type Directors Club as well as a TDC Medal recipient. He will be missed.

If you would like to attend Martin’s service, it will be held this Friday, March 10 at 2:15 p.m.:

Gutterman’s Funeral Home  
175 North Long Beach Road  
Rockville Centre, NY 11570  
T : 516-764-9400

A Memorial Service is scheduled for Wednesday evening, 10 May 2006 in the FIT Amphitheater.

I’ve also wote up [some quick memories on my blog...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829234942/http:/williamsburg-nerd.blogspot.com/2006/03/obituary-martin-solomon.html)
